Hi All, 

I'm new here.  I kind of stumbled upon this group in my quest for=
 information.  I recently received a tsuba as a gift from a dear friend.  A=
 NBTHK certificate came with it, and I was wondering if someone can point m=
e a direction where I can have it translated?  Many thanks!
